notes.body: Hello Sagar,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #657266362380746752-26769, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the DHOOTAPAPESHWAR SHILAPRAVANG SPECIAL - 30 TABLETS  on 17th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 byusiness days.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Sagar,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order #657266362380746752-26769, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the DHOOTAPAPESHWAR SHILAPRAVANG SPECIAL - 30 TABLETS  on 17th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.
 
Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 byusiness days.
 
We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

Hi Manisha,
I received the refund, but while placing an order through Payzap I faced an issue. The amount from Pharmeasy was automatically refunded to the original source even though no refund was initiated. After the payment was successful, the app redirected me again to the payment completion page, as the refund had originally been triggered by the app itself.

No problem you can close the case.


Regards,
Pramod D

notes.body: Hello Lavanya,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   I understand your concern regarding the order #584419968020746240-48875. Please be informed, that the return validity for NEVANAC BOTTLE OF 5ML OPHTHALMIC SUSPENSION was 15 days from the date of delivery.    Your order is delivered to you on 22nd May 2025 and the return window is closed. I would have surely helped you if you have contacted us within the reporting timeframe. Hence, we will be unable to return the requested medicine or process a refund. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.  ​​   Additionally, please be informed that the images shared by you correspond to the May 2025 order and not to the August 2025 order. Hence we are unable to comply with your request.   PharmEasy offers a flexible return policy for items ordered with us. Under this policy, each item purchased will have a returnable window which can vary anywhere between 0 to 7 days, post its delivery. The return window is listed in the returns section of the order, once delivered. You may check the below link to know about our return policy,  https://PharmEasy.in/help/returns-43000349468/how-does-PharmEasy-s-return-policy-work--43000220410   ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Lavanya,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
I understand your concern regarding the order #584419968020746240-48875. Please be informed, that the return validity for NEVANAC BOTTLE OF 5ML OPHTHALMIC SUSPENSION was 15 days from the date of delivery. 

Your order is delivered to you on 22nd May 2025 and the return window is closed. I would have surely helped you if you have contacted us within the reporting timeframe. Hence, we will be unable to return the requested medicine or process a refund. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.
​​
Additionally, please be informed that the images shared by you correspond to the May 2025 order and not to the August 2025 order. Hence we are unable to comply with your request.

PharmEasy offers a flexible return policy for items ordered with us. Under this policy, each item purchased will have a returnable window which can vary anywhere between 0 to 7 days, post its delivery. The return window is listed in the returns section of the order, once delivered. You may check the below link to know about our return policy,
https://PharmEasy.in/help/returns-43000349468/how-does-PharmEasy-s-return-policy-work--43000220410 
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hi,
Even after written reminder through mail trail communication regarding proper hygienic measures I had a very disappointing experience today morning when the collecting agent turned up almost half an hour ago and WITHOUT ANY MASK. When I had asked him about the mask before allowing him to enter, he mentioned that he will wear inside, but he wasn't wearing anything...... again I had to remind him about the mask and then he said he forgot it in the bike and will manage with his helmet and in the middle of preparation he suggested to go down from 4th floor to bring his mask which I found already too late.  
What kind of agents do you hire for sample collection that they think helmet can be used as a replacement for the mask? I never found such intelligent folks in Bangalore where ALL collection agents were very disciplined irrespective of the organization or hospital they belong to. 
 Also this agent was not wearing clean clothes, neither well-groomed and surprisingly, I noticed him keeping all used gloves in a side pocket of his bag; not sure what is the purpose of collecting such used gloves. 
I understand, it could be a regional nuisance; but that can't be an excuse as we depend on the brand name and can't put our health at risk due to such basic negligence, especially when other senior citizens are at home.

He called me form mobile number 7949106890 and I doubt whether any replacement person was sent in place of the originally assigned agent, because till now I am having a weird kind of pain passing through nerves in my left hand which I never experienced before.
I recall during my previous appointment with Thyrocare booked through BEATO in July 2025 (booked through same mobile for my mother) when this Mr. Bidhan Sadhu called me prior evening, I had an argument with him regarding genuineness of PharmEasy in such location, because agent in Bangalore told me that they don't get access of customer's number unless one hour before appointment and next morning I got to know that Mr. Sadhu refused my appointment and hence, Mr Hritik Shaw had to come from a very distant place Raniganj, but he took all precautionary measures.
 Also I would like to highlight that parameters of KFT in Thyrocare is different from other organization / hospitals and doesn't include basic salts Na & K, but generally all doctors look for three basic salts Na/K/Ca; not sure why such health package is recommended form CARE and it is a paid rider.
PS: Just a while ago I received SMS notification at 12:32 am that sample collected in the morning has reached the lab now. 
Regards, Sanjib Kumar Saha 
 

    On Wednesday 10 December, 2025 at 09:02:32 pm IST, <hello@getvisitapp.com> wrote:

Additionally, we have checked and found that your appointment is reflected as confirmed.
If you face any further issues, please feel free to reach out to us. We will be happy to assist you.

Regards,
Visit Health Support Team

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hi,

Even after written reminder through mail trail communication regarding proper hygienic measures I had a very disappointing experience today morning when the collecting agent turned up almost half an hour ago and WITHOUT ANY MASK.
 
When I had asked him about the mask before allowing him to enter, he mentioned that he will wear inside, but he wasn't wearing anything...... again I had to remind him about the mask and then he said he forgot it in the bike and will manage with his helmet and in the middle of preparation he suggested to go down from 4th floor to bring his mask which I found already too late.  

What kind of agents do you hire for sample collection that they think helmet can be used as a replacement for the mask? I never found such intelligent folks in Bangalore where ALL collection agents were very disciplined irrespective of the organization or hospital they belong to. 

 Also this agent was not wearing clean clothes, neither well-groomed and surprisingly, I noticed him keeping all used gloves in a side pocket of his bag; not sure what is the purpose of collecting such used gloves. 

I understand, it could be a regional nuisance; but that can't be an excuse as we depend on the brand name and can't put our health at risk due to such basic negligence, especially when other senior citizens are at home.

He called me form mobile number 7949106890 and I doubt whether any replacement person was sent in place of the originally assigned agent, because till now I am having a weird kind of pain passing through nerves in my left hand which I never experienced before.

I recall during my previous appointment with Thyrocare booked through BEATO in July 2025 (booked through same mobile for my mother) when this Mr. Bidhan Sadhu called me prior evening, I had an argument with him regarding genuineness of PharmEasy in such location, because agent in Bangalore told me that they don't get access of customer's number unless one hour before appointment and next morning I got to know that Mr. Sadhu refused my appointment and hence, Mr Hritik Shaw had to come from a very distant place Raniganj, but he took all precautionary measures.

 Also I would like to highlight that parameters of KFT in Thyrocare is different from other organization / hospitals and doesn't include basic salts Na & K, but generally all doctors look for three basic salts Na/K/Ca; not sure why such health package is recommended form CARE and it is a paid rider.

PS: Just a while ago I received SMS notification at 12:32 am that sample collected in the morning has reached the lab now. 

Regards, 
Sanjib Kumar Saha

  • Kidney Function Test (Basic): BUN, BUN/Creatinine Ratio, Urea, Creatinine, Uric Acid
  • Liver Function Test (LFT)

Additionally, we have checked and found that your appointment is reflected as confirmed.

On Dec 13, 2025 at 1:56 AM Sanjib Saha wrote:
Hi,
 
Even after written reminder through mail trail communication regarding proper hygienic measures I had a very disappointing experience today morning when the collecting agent turned up almost half an hour ago and WITHOUT ANY MASK.
 
When I had asked him about the mask before allowing him to enter, he mentioned that he will wear inside, but he wasn't wearing anything...... again I had to remind him about the mask and then he said he forgot it in the bike and will manage with his helmet and in the middle of preparation he suggested to go down from 4th floor to bring his mask which I found already too late.  
 
What kind of agents do you hire for sample collection that they think helmet can be used as a replacement for the mask? I never found such intelligent folks in Bangalore where ALL collection agents were very disciplined irrespective of the organization or hospital they belong to. 
 
 Also this agent was not wearing clean clothes, neither well-groomed and surprisingly, I noticed him keeping all used gloves in a side pocket of his bag; not sure what is the purpose of collecting such used gloves. 
 
I understand, it could be a regional nuisance; but that can't be an excuse as we depend on the brand name and can't put our health at risk due to such basic negligence, especially when other senior citizens are at home.
 
He called me form mobile number 7949106890 and I doubt whether any replacement person was sent in place of the originally assigned agent, because till now I am having a weird kind of pain passing through nerves in my left hand which I never experienced before.
 
I recall during my previous appointment with Thyrocare booked through BEATO in July 2025 (booked through same mobile for my mother) when this Mr. Bidhan Sadhu called me prior evening, I had an argument with him regarding genuineness of PharmEasy in such location, because agent in Bangalore told me that they don't get access of customer's number unless one hour before appointment and next morning I got to know that Mr. Sadhu refused my appointment and hence, Mr Hritik Shaw had to come from a very distant place Raniganj, but he took all precautionary measures.
 
 Also I would like to highlight that parameters of KFT in Thyrocare is different from other organization / hospitals and doesn't include basic salts Na & K, but generally all doctors look for three basic salts Na/K/Ca; not sure why such health package is recommended form CARE and it is a paid rider.
 
PS: Just a while ago I received SMS notification at 12:32 am that sample collected in the morning has reached the lab now. 
 
Regards, 
Sanjib Kumar Saha 
 
 
 
On Wednesday 10 December, 2025 at 09:02:32 pm IST, <hello@getvisitapp.com> wrote:
 
 
Dear User,
Greetings!
Apologies for the inconvenience caused to you.
As per your concern, please find below the list of tests included:
  • Calcium – Total
  • Complete Blood Count (CBC)
  • Complete Urine Routine Analysis (CUE)
  • Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate (ESR)
  • Blood Sugar (Fasting)
  • Thyroid Stimulating Hormone (TSH)
  • Uric Acid
  • Kidney Function Test (Basic): BUN, BUN/Creatinine Ratio, Urea, Creatinine, Uric Acid
  • Liver Function Test (LFT)
  • Lipid Profile
  • HbA1c (Glycosylated Hemoglobin)
  • Vitamin D3 (25 Hydroxy)
Additionally, we have checked and found that your appointment is reflected as confirmed.
If you face any further issues, please feel free to reach out to us. We will be happy to assist you.
Regards,
Visit Health Support Team

On Dec 10, 2025 at 5:03 PM Sanjib Kumar Saha wrote:
Can you please share all tests name in detail?
 
Also please ensure sample collection agent must wear mask, gloves and take all hygienic precautions.

Regards,
Sanjib Saha

I understand, it could be a regional nuisance; but that can't be an excuse as we depend on the brand name and can't put our health at risk due to such basic negligence, especially when other senior citizens are at home.

He called me form mobile number 7949106890 and I doubt whether any replacement person was sent in place of the originally assigned agent, because till now I am having a weird kind of pain passing through nerves in my left hand which I never experienced before.

I recall during my previous appointment with Thyrocare booked through BEATO in July 2025 (booked through same mobile for my mother) when this Mr. Bidhan Sadhu called me prior evening, I had an argument with him regarding genuineness of PharmEasy in such location, because agent in Bangalore told me that they don't get access of customer's number unless one hour before appointment and next morning I got to know that Mr. Sadhu refused my appointment and hence, Mr Hritik Shaw had to come from a very distant place Raniganj, but he took all precautionary measures.

 Also I would like to highlight that parameters of KFT in Thyrocare is different from other organization / hospitals and doesn't include basic salts Na & K, but generally all doctors look for three basic salts Na/K/Ca; not sure why such health package is recommended form CARE and it is a paid rider.

PS: Just a while ago I received SMS notification at 12:32 am that sample collected in the morning has reached the lab now. 

Regards, 
Sanjib Kumar Saha

Also we would like to inform you that cancellation refund of Rs.2236.76/- initiated on 13th December 2025 and same will be refunded to your source account within 5-7 business days.     We would request you to place a new order and we will ensure the order is delivered to you on priority.     Be rest assured as we have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. notes.body_html:
Hello Deepak,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #654531279653421056-29115. 
 
We can see that your order was canceled on 13th December 2025. Due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.

Also we would like to inform you that cancellation refund of Rs.2236.76/- initiated on 13th December 2025 and same will be refunded to your source account within 5-7 business days.
 
We would request you to place a new order and we will ensure the order is delivered to you on priority.
 
Be rest assured as we have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. Looking forward to delighting you soon.
 
If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!   ​   With regards to your order #658415412629635072-49328, I have checked the medicine EUTHYROX 25MCG BOTTLE OF 100 TABLETS has an expiry date of November 2026. I wish to inform you that we ensure that the shelf life of the medicines being supplied by our partner retailers.        Please note that expiry dates may vary depending on the available stock received by the partner retailer.     However, if the expiry on the medicine packaging differs from what is printed on the bill, please get back to us post delivery with the image of the medicine highlighting the batch number so that we can get the issue resolved.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 
​
With regards to your order #658415412629635072-49328, I have checked the medicine EUTHYROX 25MCG BOTTLE OF 100 TABLETS has an expiry date of November 2026. I wish to inform you that we ensure that the shelf life of the medicines being supplied by our partner retailers.

Please note that expiry dates may vary depending on the available stock received by the partner retailer.

However, if the expiry on the medicine packaging differs from what is printed on the bill, please get back to us post delivery with the image of the medicine highlighting the batch number so that we can get the issue resolved.
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Sheela,      Greetings from PharmEasy!    ​   I understand the concern regarding the PharmEasy wallet.     I would like to inform you that we have divided the amount to give better clarity about the cashback earned and the refund amount received. We wish to encourage our customers to utilize the benefits and not miss out on any recent offers.     Refund Cash will include the amount received against the refund of your canceled order or returned products. This amount will not have any expiry date and it can be fully utilized to make payment.     As per the revised guidelines, please note that 5% of the payable amount would be adjusted from your cashback section of the PharmEasy wallet (5% of any Cashback amount added to the PharmEasy wallet).      I would like to inform you that this is done in the best of your interest. We are constantly working to improve our services and would appreciate your understanding in this matter. The expiry for the cashback received under the loyalty program is 60 days.      You may visit the link mentioned below for clarification.https://pharmeasy.in/help/pharmeasy-wallet-43000349469     I hope I have addressed your concern.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  Tahera
notes.body_html:
Hello Sheela,

Greetings from PharmEasy!  
​
I understand the concern regarding the PharmEasy wallet.

I would like to inform you that we have divided the amount to give better clarity about the cashback earned and the refund amount received. We wish to encourage our customers to utilize the benefits and not miss out on any recent offers.

Refund Cash will include the amount received against the refund of your canceled order or returned products. This amount will not have any expiry date and it can be fully utilized to make payment.

As per the revised guidelines, please note that 5% of the payable amount would be adjusted from your cashback section of the PharmEasy wallet (5% of any Cashback amount added to the PharmEasy wallet). 

I would like to inform you that this is done in the best of your interest. We are constantly working to improve our services and would appreciate your understanding in this matter. The expiry for the cashback received under the loyalty program is 60 days. 

You may visit the link mentioned below for clarification.https://pharmeasy.in/help/pharmeasy-wallet-43000349469

I hope I have addressed your concern.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
Tahera

notes.body: Hello Sunoti,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I tried to reach you earlier today at 02:14 PM on 9577474825, but unfortunately, I was unable to connect with you.     I understand your query is related to placing a medicine order.      To place an order, you may visit the PharmEasy app or website. Alternatively, you may call us on 999299929 and press option number "1" to place an order on call.     You can place your order through the PharmEasy App by following the steps below:     - Download and open the PharmEasy App  - Click on "Order Medicines" and search for the medicine/product name, and add it to the cart.  - Select the medicine/product quantity and click on "Continue" and Add/Change delivery address.  - Apply any coupon (If applicable).  - Select the available payment mode and click on "Place Order"     I have highlighted the issue to the Operations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Tahera
notes.body_html:
Hello Sunoti,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I tried to reach you earlier today at 02:14 PM on 9577474825, but unfortunately, I was unable to connect with you.

I understand your query is related to placing a medicine order. 

To place an order, you may visit the PharmEasy app or website. Alternatively, you may call us on 999299929 and press option number "1" to place an order on call.

You can place your order through the PharmEasy App by following the steps below:

- Download and open the PharmEasy App
- Click on "Order Medicines" and search for the medicine/product name, and add it to the cart.
- Select the medicine/product quantity and click on "Continue" and Add/Change delivery address.
- Apply any coupon (If applicable).
- Select the available payment mode and click on "Place Order"

I have highlighted the issue to the Operations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Tahera

notes.body_html:
Hello Sunoti Roy,

Thank you for reaching out about placing your medicine order.

Our team has called you for order placement but you mentioned due to you are not sure about mediicine he will place order later on. To place the order, you can:

- Visit the PharmEasy app or website, or
- Call us at 99929 99929 to place the order over the phone.

If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body:
Merged from ticket 22279914  
      Subject: Urgent: Issue with Mounjaro Injections – Case ID #22276354  
      Description:  
 Dear PharmEasy Support Team, 
   
 I hope you are doing well. I am writing to formally report an issue with two Mounjaro injections purchased through PharmEasy — the 2.5 mg dose purchased approximately two months ago and the 5 mg dose purchased last month. 
   
 In both cases, the injection stopped working from the 4th dose, which is highly concerning. I have already raised a case on call, and the reference number provided to me is #22276354. As advised, I have also emailed the photos of the injections for your review and records. 
 
   
 Given that these injections are extremely expensive (₹3,500–₹4,500 per dose), this malfunction has caused significant financial loss and disruption to my treatment plan. I request your urgent assistance in investigating this matter and providing a suitable resolution at the earliest. 
   
 I look forward to a swift and positive response. 
   
 Warm regards,   
 
  Vikram Bahadur Singh +919482506860

I hope you are doing well. I am writing to formally report an issue with two Mounjaro injections purchased through PharmEasy — the 2.5 mg dose purchased approximately two months ago and the 5 mg dose purchased last month.

In both cases, the injection stopped working from the 4th dose, which is highly concerning. I have already raised a case on call, and the reference number provided to me is #22276354. As advised, I have also emailed the photos of the injections for your review and records.

Given that these injections are extremely expensive (₹3,500–₹4,500 per dose), this malfunction has caused significant financial loss and disruption to my treatment plan. I request your urgent assistance in investigating this matter and providing a suitable resolution at the earliest.

I look forward to a swift and positive response.
